It's the start of the week but what better way to blow away those Monday blues than with a win at the racing.

With four meetings across the UK, there is no shortage of action for punters to enjoy and look to cover their weekend spending with a win.

Our top tipster Newsboy has made his picks for the meetings at Windsor, Plumpton, Pontefract and Salisbury after doing his research.

Take a look at his tips below and sharpen those betting pencils - but please remember to always gamble responsibly.
